page.title: 10RAF CROUGHTON - US BASE 2
page.content: In addition to this and three other smaller units, there is also a High School and Elementary/Middle School for the children of US servicemen, with a population of 1200 students. As on all US bases, shops, clubs, restaurants and churches are provided at Croughton and Upper Heyford for US Personnel. They are not restricted to the bases, however, and 'The Blackbird' public house in the village is well patronised, particularly at lunch times. Several children attend the village playgroup, and the infant class of the village school (formal education does not start until six years on the Base). There are 111 'family housing units' on the base, and dormitory accommodation for 200 personnel.
